Why was the RaceCondition currency launched with a high reserve of 100 million VRSC and a stable supply?

The RaceCondition currency was not launched with a high reserve of 100 million VRSC and a stable supply. In fact, it was launched with a very low reserve of only 10 VRSC and a high supply of 100 million. This, combined with its 5% algorithmically controlled fractional reserve of Verus and high volatility, made it vulnerable to manipulation and ultimately led to an exit scam.
